name: Lucky Night: Poker Games
description: Exciting Blackjack and Texas Hold'em games in VR.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i5 - 4590/AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 ( AMD Radeon R9 290 ) DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated sound card
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i7/AMD R5 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX1070 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated sound card
